title: paypal review
description: What do you like best about PayPal?most of the time i can get paid whenever and whereever i am around the globe, and its easy to use, with just an email, you are good to go. What do you dislike about PayPal?some time it taken 2 to 5 working days for the fund to appear, here in south africa its only easy to integrate with FNB. What problems is PayPal solving and how is that benefiting you?Easy way for individual and business to send and receive payments online. it benefits me becauce i can do business online and be rest assured that i'm going to be paid using paypal, it would've been dificult for me to do business online if it wasn't for paypal.

title: Reliable and Efficient Payment Solution
description: What do you like best about PayPal?The best part about PayPal is its ease of use and widespread acceptance. It's incredibly convenient for both personal and business transactions. PayPal's secure and fast transactions are incredibly beneficial. The platform's user-friendly interface and integration with numerous online stores and services make it a go-to payment solution. The buyer protection feature adds an extra layer of security, ensuring that my financial details are always protected. What do you dislike about PayPal?The transaction fees can sometimes be on the higher side, especially for international payments. The dispute resolution process can be lengthy at times, but overall, the reliability and convenience of PayPal outweigh this drawback. What problems is PayPal solving and how is that benefiting you?PayPal solves the problem of secure, hassle-free online transactions. It provides a reliable platform for making and receiving payments globally, ensuring my financial data is protected. This convenience and security benefit me by simplifying how I handle my finances online and reducing the risk of fraud.

title: My PayPal Review
description: What do you like best about PayPal?I like best about Paypal is that I can use it for my job payment as a freelancer social media marketing.I also use it for payment and its available to all country.And the security is improving now.Another thing is that some my clients preferred Paypal for job payment of my services.I use it for professional payment for my services by clients and purchasing online mode of payment in lazada /tiktok ads What do you dislike about PayPal?I dont like some service fee its to high just to trasfer to other bank and the process its take some business working 7 days before it reflect  to my PayPal dashboard. What problems is PayPal solving and how is that benefiting you?Paypal solve my problem in term of payment I dont have actual cash But through the help of  online payment Paypal is there I can use.Another thing is that Paypal is preffered by some of my clients and affiliate advertising company to pay my services/commisions as a social media marketing it is a big help to me.I can also use it  for payment for online purchase for online shopping.

title: Most used payment gateway on the Internet for Web Pages
description:
What do you like best about PayPal?I like PayPal because the API is compatible with virtual stores, WordPress and associating prepaid credit cards.
Create users, send notifications to receive payments, QR generation and Gift Card purchase.
Fraud protection and email verification. What do you dislike about PayPal?Customer fraud claiming payments and refund scams are increasing on the Internet and PayPal, more help is needed for businesses. What problems is PayPal solving and how is that benefiting you?Add PayPal for virtual payments and receive credit card security, online service payments, user blocking and payments with my email.
I always like to protect my credit card code, I always recommend using payment gateways and not exposing the code on the Internet.

It is flexible to use  and offers  various peymenta options such as credit debit,bank transfers and paypal balances. Customers frequently use it to purchase products and for shopping. title: My Take on PayPal: Convenient, Secure, but With Some Costs
description: What do you like best about PayPal?Been using paypal every week for the past 6 years, and obviously I cannot possibly have any complaints for using it this long.  PayPal's widespread acceptance makes it a convenient payment option for international transactions. Been using Paypal for many years, and all my clients prefer sending payments through this platform for its security and ease of use.  I personally had my paypal account integrated with my hubstaff account, and enjoyed the convenience in making may payments to my members, as I invoice them thru hubstaff.   I like it best when is terms of speed of transaction;  generally transactions are processed quickly, with funds often available instantly. What do you dislike about PayPal?PayPal's fees, especially for business transactions and currency conversions, can be relatively high compared to some other payment platforms.  Also have had my fair share of bad experienced, difficulties in resolving disputes or getting timely support.  Could have been better if chat support is made available for immediate concerns, specially in most cases it is all about widrawing funds. What problems is PayPal solving and how is that benefiting you?PayPal makes my life so much easier by tackling a few major headaches with online transactions. Handling international payments is a breeze with its currency conversion, saving me from extra fees. Plus, their buyer and seller protections ensure I'm covered if something goes wrong.

title: Convenient and Secure Online Payment Platform
description: What do you like best about PayPal?PayPal makes online transactions quick, secure, and hassle-free What do you dislike about PayPal?The fees for transactions, especially international transfers or currency conversions, can be high. What problems is PayPal solving and how is that benefiting you?PayPal provides a secure platform for online transactions, protecting users' financial information and reducing the risk of fraud ,  It provides a seamless way to make payments and receive money across borders.

title: Old but gold
description: What do you like best about PayPal?PayPal is probably the oldest and largest fintech like company in the world. It has many 3rd party sites where you can use it to pay. It's very flexibe considering implementation. Also PayPal have very good customer support which can take care of any problem client may approach. What do you dislike about PayPal?I don't see any downsides with using PayPal as I have been using it. Maybe only one is that it is not very modern these days, because it is a large company hence any upgrades take much longer than in other, smaller companies with similar profile. What problems is PayPal solving and how is that benefiting you?PayPal allows me to quickly and securely pay on mostly e-commerce sites. I don't have to save a card or make long lasting bank transfers to get what I want. Also I can always use PayPal customer service to help me with any problems I may approach.

title: Superb Platform for International Remittance
description: What do you like best about PayPal?Super easy to use with simple to navigate User interface. I've used it for 2 years now and I'm really happy with the service. What do you dislike about PayPal?The time taken for the amount to get credited to your regional bank account is really long. What problems is PayPal solving and how is that benefiting you?Payment Processing and Gateway

title: Using PayPal
description: What do you like best about PayPal?PayPal is the most efficient way I receive USD. Also, it automatically converts to CAD whenever I'm making a transfer with no hassle. What do you dislike about PayPal?Honestly there's nothing I dislike about PayPal I just with they had a physical card that would be cool What problems is PayPal solving and how is that benefiting you?PayPal is the only platform I'm able to receive large amount of USD with no hassle or my bank being blocked. It's very convenient

title: Comprehensive and Reliable
description:
What do you like best about PayPal?User-Friendly Interface & Versatility in Transactions What do you dislike about PayPal?Higher fees and lower conversion rates compared to others What problems is PayPal solving and how is that benefiting you?Versatility in Transactions
PayPal supports various transactions, from personal payments to business invoicing. It’s incredibly versatile, allowing users to send and receive money across the globe, pay for goods and services, and even make charitable donations. The integration with various e-commerce platforms further enhances its usability for online shopping.

title: PayPal for a secure online transaction
description:
What do you like best about PayPal?PayPal is a secure online platform to receive and send payment digitally. I have had the best experience since I started using PayPal 8 years. It is fast, safe and has the best customer support. You can send money anywhere, anytime and to anybody in the world regardless of the location. It is also free to open an account with them and even transactions fee is minimal. What do you dislike about PayPal?PayPal limitation of account. I had bad experience with PayPal last year. They limited my account for 180 days and I had a lot of cash to withdraw. I had to borrow money to pay my writers. Recommendations to others considering PayPal:PayPal is your favourite payment partner, Try it out and you will be amazed. What problems is PayPal solving and how is that benefiting you?I use Paypal for: 
Invoicing and payments online
send money and pay for goods from several websites
Freelancing

title: In love with this for over 7 years!
description: What do you like best about PayPal?That I dont even have to transfer the funds  if I dont want to. I can just shop online and use it as my method of payment. What do you dislike about PayPal?That it does not allow transfer to my local bank when I am in Jamaica. What problems is PayPal solving and how is that benefiting you?I don't know what problems they are solving currently, but I do hope that it involves allowing transfers from paypal to local banks in Jamaica.

title: Accessible Money Sender
description: What do you like best about PayPal?Paypal is handy in terms of receiving and sending money anywhere in the world. You can always trust that your money is intact. I like the way their customer service handles concerns with availabilty and understanding. They can explain the steps and solutions very well. They can also provide faster solutions in minutes! What do you dislike about PayPal?Maybe their dashboard because it's somewhat outdated in my own opinion. Their detail transactions aren't quite clear enough. There are details that I would like to see but it doesn't show in the dashboard. What problems is PayPal solving and how is that benefiting you?One problem is since CARD account numbers differ in each country, they did not put the proper instructions. Looking at the Paypal community, a lot of Filipino users tend to do it the wrong way because of lack of instructions. Hope they can rewrite it soon though. Their withdrawal fee is a bit of high sometimes, too.
reviewerName: Verified User in Commercial Real EstateInformation

title: Global e-transfer platform!
description:
What do you like best about PayPal?PayPal is a secure and easy to use platform for either sending or receiving funds electronically.

I love the fact that it has all currencies that make global transfer a smooth process.

It allows integration of other financial platforms like bank apps for easy transfer.

It also has an inbuilt calculator that converts amount like instance from a US dollar to a Kenyan Shilling based on the rates at the given time. What do you dislike about PayPal?PayPal is a good platform only that I have a dislike where it holds funds for approximately 21 days for new users or if you make multiole transactions in a day, this strategy I don't like because even after you provide the required documents to show validity or verification it still holds funds hindering transfer. What problems is PayPal solving and how is that benefiting you?PayPal as I said earlier has helped me manage funds transfer as well as purchasing premiums of platforms I use like Zoom.

title: Easy to use
description: What do you like best about PayPal?I love paypal specially for  the freelancers like me. I highly recommend using paypal. what I like the most is the paypal to gcash feature for a pinoy like me it is easier to withdraw the money. What do you dislike about PayPal?I think the service fee is quite high and the excharge rate is low. What problems is PayPal solving and how is that benefiting you?Easy to use and easy to transact with my clients

title: Ineffective support
description: What do you like best about PayPal?Clients seems to know it and trust it. That is the positive side. What do you dislike about PayPal?Their support rapresentatives are not able to help me and they bounce between departments. I asked about activating reference transactions and the Paypal Customer Service team told me to open a ticket to the Merchant Technical Support Team. I did. Waited an answer, and I was told from Ilia Elizarov that I am supposed to contact the Paypal Customer Service team. So basically now I have to contact back via Phone and try to understand who can help me with this. This is just in order to enable subscriptions. What problems is PayPal solving and how is that benefiting you?PayPal is allowing my company to receive money from clients.

title: PayPal integration with Bidding Owl is Great
description: What do you like best about PayPal?We use PayPal for not only our annual large fundraiser through Bidding Owl which makes checkout and processing a breeze. We also use it for our online store processing into out own in house developed POS and it is great. The connection into our accounting software which is Quickbooks online is also makes reconcilations and tracking simple and easy. What do you dislike about PayPal?The nly dislike is actually that a lot of people for some reason refuse to use PayPAl which I do not understand. Maybe PayPal could give some incentives for new users first few tranasactions so we could doi more business through PayPal. Not really a dislike on PayPal just that they are getting a bad rap. What problems is PayPal solving and how is that benefiting you?PayPal makes it easy for us to use multiple platforms of revenue streams into our acconting and POS software.

title: Convenient and Secure
description: What do you like best about PayPal?Convenient Digital wallet and the Customer Service are great What do you dislike about PayPal?High fees and account holds can be frustrating. What problems is PayPal solving and how is that benefiting you?PayPal solves the problem of secure and convenient online payments, making it easier to shop, send money, and receive payments without sharing sensitive financial information. It benefits me by offering a trusted platform that works globally, simplifies transactions, and provides buyer protection, which adds a layer of security and peace of mind.

title: PayPal for international money transfer
description: What do you like best about PayPal?The simplicity of integration with any website, regardless of the platform on which it is built. All the components of this payment mechanism are easily parameterizable. It inspires confidence because it is utilized on par with other payment options. It is a safe platform that doesn't cause mistakes for users, programmers, or administrators. What do you dislike about PayPal?Nothing about Paypal annoys me on a regular basis. Balances can stay frozen for extended periods. Possibly one of its worst flaws is that it does not offer the best customer service. What problems is PayPal solving and how is that benefiting you?It provides an increasingly common form of payment. Everybody has faith in the platform. I utilize it within the payment gateways of numerous clients' websites. It offers a method for allocating payments in connection with invoices, accounting assistance, and transactions. Aid the organization in charge of collecting.

title: PayPal is the Best option to business in Abroad
description: What do you like best about PayPal?PayPal has one of the best user friendly interface along with easy API integration and quick implementation process. We do transactions frequently and there is no vital issue till now. Customers and easily set up the payment method and do hassle free transactions. PayPal also sends periodic reports which is very useful for taxation purpose. What do you dislike about PayPal?The fees PayPal charged can be revised. The customer service needs improvement as PayPal is operating an important service world wide. Sometime accounts frozen for security measures. That needs to evaluate. What problems is PayPal solving and how is that benefiting you?The most common payment solution for our world wide business network. Sending and receiving money is too easy and comfortable. The periodic reports are very useful for taxation purpose. Recently we introduce BNPL service which is also popular.

title: Je suis malgré tout satisfait de paypal
description: What do you like best about PayPal?j'apprécie particulièrement la facilité d'utilisation de PayPal pour les transactions en ligne. Ses avantages incluent la sécurité des paiements, la possibilité d'envoyer des fonds rapidement et de recevoir des paiements de manière pratique, contribuant ainsi à une expérience globale efficace et fiable. What do you dislike about PayPal?Je suis mécontent des frais associés à l'utilisation de PayPal, notamment les frais de transaction qui sont élevés. De plus, les éventuelles restrictions de compte et les procédures de résolution des litiges peuvent être perçues comme des inconvénients. un autre inconvénient notable est la non-éligibilité de certains pays, limitant ainsi l'accès à PayPal pour les entreprises dans ces régions. Cela peut entraver l'expansion de la clientèle à l'échelle mondiale, ce qui est crucial dans le commerce international. La disponibilité géographique reste une considération importante pour les utilisateurs professionnels comme nous. Enfin, selon moi ! What problems is PayPal solving and how is that benefiting you?PayPal m'offrant une plateforme sécurisée et pratique pour les transactions en ligne. Il me facilite le processus de paiement, il m'aide en réduisant les risques de fraude et offre une méthode de paiement fiable pour mes clients. De plus, il me simplifie la gestion des transactions, favorise la confiance de mes consommateurs et peut aider à élargir d'avantage la portée internationale des entreprises si les restrictions quant à la non-eligibilité de certains pays sont levées bien sûre.
reviewerName: Verified User in Marketing and AdvertisingInformation

title: International use

It presents a way to organize payments, in relation to invoice, accounting support and transaction. Help the collection organization.

What problems is PayPal solving and how is that benefiting you?Paypal offers most of online platforms and even in the checkout I'm always trust paypal as an reliable payment option for merchants.

description:

title: Don’t Trust Them With A Cent
description: What do you like best about PayPal?The is no upside to this company, they are strictly in it for themselves. They say you have buyer protection but don't do a thing when a purchase go astray, your on your own. Their entire company is handled by the Philippines and your not going to get one US based employee on the phone What do you dislike about PayPal?Everything, they do nothing but lie and then play games. Your money is theirs to do what they want and they could care less. PayPal is not a US company they are strictly off shore and they just send your money to the executives in the US. Worthless company. What problems is PayPal solving and how is that benefiting you?Nothing we fired them.

title: The best and the safest way to pay others
description: What do you like best about PayPal?It's super easy to use and I feel safe paying for my online orders. What do you dislike about PayPal?Small fees that they charge to transfer money from PayPal to bank account What problems is PayPal solving and how is that benefiting you?Payments

title: PayPal for international money transfer
description: What do you like best about PayPal?It is one of the easiest and safest ways for international money transfers and receiving money from freelancer websites. It has a customer-friendly interface and clear instructions on its usability. On implementation, creating a PayPal account is easy and requires verification of documents like a National identification card or a passport for security purposes. On integration, a user can link their PayPal account to a bank account or a Visa card and use them to receive money. PayPal also responds to customer queries and concerns within 24 hours most of the time. It has features like holding funds for up to 21 days to ensure the safety of both the buyer and the seller, or rather the sender and the receiver. It has no limitation on the frequency of use per day, month, or year. What do you dislike about PayPal?One of the major problems associated with using PayPal is sudden account closure without a proper explanation of the terms broken or a proper window for appeal. Also freezing of funds for up to 21 days without considering the intention of the sender is also a major drawback. Sometimes, even with the intervention of the sender, PayPal doesn't release the money. Transacting a large amount of money on PayPal attracts huge fees. Dispute resolution is often ambiguous to the extent that the party trying to resolve an issue has to just give up. What problems is PayPal solving and how is that benefiting you?PayPal helps me receive payments from freelancer websites and grants

title: Sell Paypal Stock before it's too late
description: What do you like best about PayPal?At this point nothing, Paypal was beneficial once when things were easier. Now any other platform can give you a better and faster service What do you dislike about PayPal?I have made a withdrawal for less than I have many times before, and they're holding the money, they said it was 24 hours and it was a lie, then they said it was 72 hours, and that was yesterday. I ask for the money to be put back so I can use another platform and forget Paypal exists, they won't and state that 72 hours haven't passed since October 9th. JUST SAY YOU WENT BANKRUPT OR SOMETHING. BTW I have sold almost all my shares in PayPal due to their horrendous service. What problems is PayPal solving and how is that benefiting you?PayPal is not solving many issues for me, I have had to use other platforms for years, and even with the occasional use, they manage to make it a nightmare

title: Reliable Payment Solution
description:
What do you like best about PayPal?Secure transactions and widespread acceptance.

PayPal has user-friendly interface, account setup is quick within a minute you can start receiving and sending money 

Invoice features for business account is very helpful to manage the transactions.

PayPal API integration is very useful and quick implementation with customised checkout on my website help me to directly receive money from on my website. What do you dislike about PayPal?PayPal heavily charges fee for transaction and also currency conversion fee is quite high.

Unessary fee charged in someplace, if I transfer my money from business account to my personal account I have to pay the fee. Charging fee for my own money? Just to transfer from one account to different.

Gap in their customers support communication with the user. PayPal occasional freeze accounts or hold funds for security reasons and worst thing is that there is no warning no prior alert for this and when account freeze no email, no information given until you contact to support team.

PayPal should also accept local currency. What problems is PayPal solving and how is that benefiting you?PayPal provide quick and easy payment gateway setup for my website. Features like PayPal button, PayPal API with customised checkout help me a lot to manage transaction on my website

title: Easy to use in payment process.
description: What do you like best about PayPal?PayPal is easy to use while shooping online because it accepts all kinds of VISA and Mastercards. therefore i use it to purchase items on online store at very low cost and interest rates. paypal is ease to deal with because money can be refunded in case money is sent to another by mistakes. Easily integrates with other service for automatic payments. What do you dislike about PayPal?It some close accounts temporary for 3 moths without clear reasons. What problems is PayPal solving and how is that benefiting you?Paypal has given a chance of shopping online without restrictions.

title: medicure money platform
description: What do you like best about PayPal?sending money to countries areound the world What do you dislike about PayPal?the amount of propesing fee you have to pay to send money What problems is PayPal solving and how is that benefiting you?money transfer

description: What do you like best about PayPal?It is very easy to integrate the payment gateway into your system. Also, it is one of the most secure payment gateway available in the market. What do you dislike about PayPal?It is costly and the per transaction charges are high. What problems is PayPal solving and how is that benefiting you?It offers a lot of different options to customers for making payments.

title: Using A PayPal Account
description: What do you like best about PayPal?Personally, the thing I like best is that PayPal is accepted by many retailers and buy/sell apps or websites. PayPal also issues most accounts with a debit card to use on their account. What do you dislike about PayPal?The thing I dislike most when using a PayPal account, is the fees associated when you are part of the sellers aspect. Just to move money from your business account to your personal PayPal account costs money, your own money. What problems is PayPal solving and how is that benefiting you?The problems I solve by using PayPal is being paid even if the buyer doesn't have a credit or debit card associated with their PayPal account. Just typing in ones PayPal account email can get ones bill paid for easy.

title: The most secure payment process
description: What do you like best about PayPal?I have found Paypal the most secure and easy to implement payment method. Their customer support system is very good. I have been using it for many time  and it can be integrated with any website. What do you dislike about PayPal?Their transaction charge should be reduced. What problems is PayPal solving and how is that benefiting you?I have used it for personal purposes and have also been involved in integrating in multiple websites. The PayPal API is so friendly and can be integrated quickly. If you have any business where you are seeking payment from any part of the world, the you must go for PayPal.

title: I like the easy ways to pay
description: What do you like best about PayPal?The way that you can transfee everybode without any problem What do you dislike about PayPal?Some payments frozen because they are not ussual users What problems is PayPal solving and how is that benefiting you?The way that I receive payments and send to someone that need it

title: Simplifying Online Payments and Secure Transactions
description: What do you like best about PayPal?One of the best things about PayPal is its convenience. It offers a seamless and user-friendly interface, making it incredibly easy to set up an account, link it to my bank account or credit card, and start making online payments. With PayPal, i can make transactions with just a few clicks, eliminating the need to enter my payment details every time i shop online. What do you dislike about PayPal?PayPal charges fees for certain types of transactions, such as receiving payments for goods and services or converting currencies. These fees can vary depending on factors like the transaction amount and the countries involved. While the fees are generally reasonable, they can add up, especially for businesses or frequent users. What problems is PayPal solving and how is that benefiting you?PayPal addresses the concern of sharing sensitive financial information with multiple online merchants. By using PayPal as an intermediary, i can keep my credit card or bank account details private and only provide them to PayPal. This reduces the risk of my information being compromised in data breaches or fraudulent transactions, providing an additional layer of security.

title: Perfect Payment Solution for Small Business Owners
description: What do you like best about PayPal?The paypal platform is easy to use even for a beginner. I like how you can utilize the invoice feature and being able to send money with your attached card if you do not have funds in your paypal balance. What do you dislike about PayPal?So far, I don't see anything that I dislike about Paypal. What problems is PayPal solving and how is that benefiting you?Paypal has an invoice system, the ability to add a buy now button on your website, you can use QR codes to recieve money, you can keep track of your subscriptions, and so much more. Its like they are an all-in-one solution platform for personal and business needs.
